Welcome to Twitter News Realtime Sensing’s documentation!¶

db_saver.periodic_db_save(topic_list=None)¶

Function that should be called regularly to store the tweets to the database and to download referenced articles

Parameters

topic_list – list of topics that tweets are collected for and that should be saved to the database

Returns

None
